title: MPfree: Blackbird Blackbird – Overboard
body:
[](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/?attachment_id=7010)[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/blackbirdblackbirduse.jpg "blackbirdblackbirduse")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6904-mpfree-blackbird-blackbird-overboard/attachment/blackbirdblackbirduse)  
  
Overboard is the brilliant new track from San Francisco based dream pop artist Blackbird Blackbird, the first song to be taken from upcoming LP Erasers (artwork above). After catching the attention of numerous people at SXSW last month, the wave of hype is rapidly gathering behind Mikey Maramag. Showing a more mature, yet still lo-fi influenced sound, Overboard is a magnificent track, held together by a tenderly plucked guitar and a simple but nostalgic beat. The reverb which echoes throughout Overboard adds an extra dimension to the song, allowing it to shimmer elegantly whilst the overlying vocals are soothingly repetitive. Download (right click/save as) or stream it below.

[Blackbird Blackbird – Overboard](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Overboard.mp3)
